thorough always treating me and our department with respect and addressing every IT problem no matter how small as if it is his most important task of his day To read full letter Click Here Quotes from Letters of Recommendation from Michael J McCarthy Vice President Connecticut Operations AECOM Johan demonstrated that he had the knowledge and expertise to handle simple and complex IT issues
